data.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
data.author: Marie Robinson

data.quote: When life gives you lemons, make orange juice
data.author: Outside the Box

data.quote: Everyday may not be a good day, but there is good in every day.
data.author: Anon

data.quote: You could be great. You could rattle the stars. You could do anything if only you dared
data.author: Sarah J. Maas
